text: Eugene Levy, (born December 17, 1946) is a Canadian movie, television, stage, voice actor, and comedian. He is known for his role in the all eight of the American Pie series of movies. He appeared in the 2012 movie Madea's Witness Protection. He has won a Emmy Award, a Grammy Award, a Gemini Award, and a Satellite Award. He voiced Charlie, Dory's father, in the 2016 Pixar movie Finding Dory and Lou the Porcupine in Over the Hedge. He is also known for his award-winning role as Johnny Rose in the television series Schitt's Creek. Levy was born in Hamilton, Ontario, Canada on December 17, 1946. and studied at McMaster University. He has been married to Deborah Divine since 1977. They have two children (Dan and Sarah) and currently live in Los Angeles, California. In 2021, he was named honorary mayor of Pacific Palisades. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:Satellite Award winners Category:1946 births Category:Living people Category:Canadian movie actors Category:Canadian television actors Category:Canadian stage actors Category:Canadian voice actors Category:Canadian comedians Category:Canadian movie producers Category:Canadian television producers Category:Writers from Ontario Category:Actors from Hamilton, Ontario Category:Emmy Award winning actors Category:Canadian Grammy Award winners
title: Eugene Levy
